article_title: Australia Looks To Scrap Tampon Tax After Student Protest
article_text: An Oklahoma bill that could send any doctor who performs an abortion to jail headed to the governor on Thursday, with opponents saying the measure is unconstitutional and promising a legal battle against the cash-strapped state if it is approved.

article_metadata.news_keywords: australia, looks, scrap, tampon, tax, after, student, protest

og.description: The Australian government on Tuesday bowed to pressure and took the first step to end a controversial sales tax on women's sanitary products.
